body.p: The Wine development release 1.1.40 is now available.

What's new in this release:
Support for Wow64 registry redirection.
Increased coverage of MSI standard actions.
Various Wordpad improvements.
Many shell fixes for better IE support.
Improved support for typelibs.
Better GL card detection.
Various bug fixes.

p.p: The source is available now. Binary packages are in the process of being built, and will appear soon at their respective download locations.
